attributes.action: Make it an offence for minsters to bin the pubics petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have read that John Reid was given a petition in Cheltenham to stop the childrens Battledown ward being closed, the petition was of around 2000+ Iam sorry to say but the petition was found in a skip in Oxford on Reids way back to London, this story is well known in Cheltenham

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
